ID:
Name:
Date of birth:
days old: ( )
months old: ( )
years old: ( )
display age:
You cannot assess patients under two months of age
You cannot assess patients 12 years old or older
Immediately refer to a health facilityYou cannot click Next. To exit press the device's back button.

legend.span: Does the patient have a cough?
How long has this cough lasted?

span.strong: Start timer and count number of breaths for a full 60 seconds

label.video: Your browser does not support HTML5 video.

span.br:
0 to 7 day old: 60 or more breaths per minute.
2 weeks to 11 months: 50 or more breaths per minute.
1 year to 5 years: 40 or more breaths per minute.

label.span: The patient does not have fast breathing

span.strong: Use your thermometer to take the patient’s temperature

legend.span: Does the patient have a fever?
How long has the fever lasted?
How long has the diarrhea lasted?
Is there blood in the diarrhea?
Does the patient have any danger signs?

label.span:
Patient Summary

Symptoms
Refer to a health facility
Refer to the health facility for .
Refer to the health facility for .
Refer to the health facility for .
Refer to the health facility for Danger Signs
Condition & Treatment
Cough
Treat with Kofoff: 1 small spoon, 3 times a day, until cough stops.
Treat with Kofoff: 1 large spoon, 3 times a day, until cough stops.
Treat with Amoxicillin: 1⁄2 small spoon, 3 times a day, for 5 days.
Treat with Amoxicillin: 1 small spoon, 3 times a day for 5 days.
Diarrhea
Treat with ORS: Supply with 2 packets. Instruct caregiver to give at least ½ cup or more after each loose stool.
Treat with Zinc: ½ tab once a day for 10 days (total of 5).
Treat with Zinc: 1 tab once a day for 10 days (total of 10).
Help the caregiver give first drink of ORS and dose of Zinc now.
Fever
Treat with Lumartem: 1 tabs twice a day for 3 days (total of 6).
Treat with Lumartem: 2 tabs twice a day for 3 days (total of 12).
Treat with Lumartem: 3 tabs twice a day for 3 days (total of 18).
Treat with Panadol: ¼ tab 3 times a day until the fever is gone.
Treat with Panadol: ½ tab 3 times a day until the fever is gone.
Treat with Panadol: 1 tab 3 times a day until the fever is gone.
Help the caregiver give first dose now.
Malnutrition
Follow Up
Follow up within 2 days to ensure patient goes to health facility for .
Follow up within 2 days to ensure patient goes to health facility for .
Press the button to set location

input.name: /assessment/outputs/symptom_cough
input.data-calculate: if ( /assessment/group_cough/patient_coughs ='yes', concat ( 'Cough', if( string-length( /assessment/group_cough/coughing_duration ) != 0, concat ( ' for ', jr:choice-name( /assessment/group_cough/coughing_duration , ' /assessment/group_cough/coughing_duration ') ), '' ) ), '' )

input.name: /assessment/outputs/symptom_diarrhea
input.data-calculate: if ( /assessment/group_diarrhea/patient_diarrhea ='yes', concat( 'Diarrhea', concat ( if( string-length( /assessment/group_diarrhea/diarrhea_duration ) != 0, concat ( ' for ', jr:choice-name( /assessment/group_diarrhea/diarrhea_duration , ' /assessment/group_diarrhea/diarrhea_duration ') ), '' ) ), if ( /assessment/group_diarrhea/diarrhea_blood ='yes', ' with blood', '') ), '' )

input.name: /assessment/outputs/symptom_fever
input.data-calculate: if ( /assessment/group_fever/patient_fever ='yes', concat ( 'Fever', if( string-length( /assessment/group_fever/fever_duration ) != 0, concat ( ' for ', jr:choice-name( /assessment/group_fever/fever_duration , ' /assessment/group_fever/fever_duration ') ), '' ) ), '' )

input.name: /assessment/patient_age_display
input.data-calculate: if (( /assessment/patient_age_in_years_int >= 2), concat( /assessment/patient_age_in_years_int ,' years'), if ( /assessment/patient_age_in_months_int >= 2, concat( /assessment/patient_age_in_months_int ,' months'), concat( /assessment/patient_age_in_days_int , ' days')))

input.name: /assessment/group_breathing/fast_breathing
input.data-calculate: if(( /assessment/group_breathing/breath_count >=60) and ( /assessment/patient_age_in_days <14), "true", if(( /assessment/group_breathing/breath_count >=50) and ( /assessment/patient_age_in_days >=14) and ( /assessment/patient_age_in_days <365), "true", if(( /assessment/group_breathing/breath_count >=40) and ( /assessment/patient_age_in_days >=365) and ( /assessment/patient_age_in_days <(5*365.25)), "true", if(( /assessment/group_breathing/breath_count >=30) and ( /assessment/patient_age_in_days >=(5*365.25)), "true", "false" ))))

input.name: /assessment/group_muac/muac_zone
input.data-calculate: if(( /assessment/group_muac/muac < 11.5), "Severe Acute Malnutrition", if(( /assessment/group_muac/muac < 12.5), "Moderate Acute Malnutrition", "" ) )

input.name: /assessment/group_diagnosis/r_condition_cough_referral_note
input.data-calculate: if ( /assessment/group_cough/patient_coughs ='yes' and ( /assessment/group_cough/chest_indrawing ='yes' or /assessment/group_cough/coughing_duration ='3weeks-or-more'), concat( 'Cough', concat( if ( /assessment/group_cough/chest_indrawing ='yes', ' with indrawn chest', '' ), if ( /assessment/group_cough/coughing_duration ='3weeks-or-more', ' for 3 weeks or more', '' ) ) ), '' )

input.name: /assessment/group_diagnosis/r_condition_cough_followup_note
input.data-calculate: if ( /assessment/group_cough/patient_coughs ='yes' and ( /assessment/group_cough/chest_indrawing ='yes' or /assessment/group_cough/coughing_duration ='3weeks-or-more' or /assessment/group_breathing/fast_breathing ='yes'), 'Follow up in 2 days for cough', '' )

input.name: /assessment/group_diagnosis/r_diarrhea_severity
input.data-calculate: if (( /assessment/group_diarrhea/patient_diarrhea ='yes' and ( /assessment/group_diarrhea/diarrhea_blood ='yes' or selected( /assessment/group_diarrhea/diarrhea_duration ,'3weeks-or-more') or selected( /assessment/group_diarrhea/diarrhea_duration ,'2-3weeks'))), 'severe', 'mild')

input.name: /assessment/group_diagnosis/r_fever_severity
input.data-calculate: if (( /assessment/group_fever/patient_fever ='yes' and (selected( /assessment/group_diarrhea/diarrhea_duration ,'3weeks-or-more') or selected( /assessment/group_diarrhea/diarrhea_duration ,'2-3weeks') or selected( /assessment/group_diarrhea/diarrhea_duration ,'1-2weeks'))), 'severe', 'mild')

input.name: /assessment/group_location/g_location_calc
input.data-calculate: concat('Your location for this report is ', if(string-length( /assessment/group_location/g_location_gps ) > 0, /assessment/group_location/g_location_gps , 'not yet set.'))

input.name: /assessment/group_location/g_location_hint_calc
input.data-calculate: if(string-length( /assessment/group_location/g_location_gps ) > 0,'If you wish to reset the location, press the trash icon above and press the "crosshair" button', 'Please make sure that your GPS is ON and that you press the "crosshair" button above before submitting your form')
